history.text: hello
Hello
what was the name of the movie?
The Wolf of Wall Street
what was it about?
Based on the description it seems like it would be pretty good.
who stars in it?
It's based on a book written by Jordan Belfort about a stock firm he used to run that bilked people out of money.
DiCaprio is the title character, Jonah Hill, Margo Robbie plays his wife.
i think i've heard of it. didn't martin scorcese direct it?
McConaughey (I think that's spell right.) is in it too.
Yes
yeah matthew mccaughey did that weird chest thumping thing.
It didn't score amazingly with the critics, but I think it would be pretty good.
Yeah.. I don't know if that was scripted or not, but it was pretty weird.
i heard it was something he did before they were filming.
they added it after they saw him do it behind the scenes
The guy is like Ryan Reynolds.  Anything he does pretty much turns to gold.
this is true. since he was on true detective everything he has done has been great.
except the dark tower
I never saw that.
i am a big fan of the books. the movie was pretty bad.

I'm not exactly sure what I'm supposed to do here.  I'm supposed to use what appears to amount to a Wikipedia or IMDB article about this movie to convince you to watch it when the entire movie is laid out in front of me.
yeah this is pretty strange. i've seen wolf of wall street. i'm supposed to act as if i haven't.

Short synopsis:  Belfort is married, makes friends with his neighbor, cheats on his wife, gets fired, finds hookers and blow, enjoys hookers and blow, gets married again, makes small fortune, FBI finds him, gets arrested, end of movie...
yeah it's really good. at points it's hard to believe it really happened.
I thought it was a great movie, but based on this article I wouldn't recommend it if this was all I knew about it.
There was a guy years back that sold the Brooklyn bridge every week for 30 years... I believe anything now.
when it's reduced to it's bare bones it sounds like it would be a sad movie when really it's not.
There are parts where you feel bad for him, but all in all its hilarious.
the lemons part is comedy gold.
I don't remember that part.

uid1response.feedback: I've seen the movie before but honestly doing this made me want to watch it again.
